mapper.select: SELECT A.REVIEW_NO , A.FRST_WRTER_ID , A.FRST_WRTER_TM , A.PLACE_ID , A.GB , A.REVIEW_CN , A.EMT_RESULT , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_TM , A.DEL_YN , A.VISIT_YMD , B.MEM_NM , C.RSTRNT_NM FROM REVIEW A, MEMBER B, RSTRNT C WHERE A.FRST_WRTER_ID = B.MEM_ID AND A.PLACE_ID = C.RSTRNT_ID AND A.PLACE_ID = #{rstrntId} ORDER BY A.VISIT_YMD DESC

WITH T AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.FRST_WRTER_TM DESC) AS RNUM , A.REVIEW_NO , A.FRST_WRTER_ID , B.MEM_NM , A.FRST_WRTER_TM , A.PLACE_ID , C.RSTRNT_NM , A.GB , A.REVIEW_CN , A.EMT_RESULT , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_TM , A.DEL_YN , A.VISIT_YMD , C.RSTRNT_IMG FROM REVIEW A INNER JOIN MEMBER B ON A.FRST_WRTER_ID = B.MEM_ID INNER JOIN RSTRNT C ON A.PLACE_ID = C.RSTRNT_ID WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.PLACE_ID = #{placeId} AND C.DEL_YN = 'N'
) SELECT T.* FROM T WHERE T.RNUM BETWEEN (#{currentPage} * #{size}) - (#{size} - 1) AND (#{currentPage} * #{size})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW A INNER JOIN MEMBER B ON A.FRST_WRTER_ID = B.MEM_ID INNER JOIN RSTRNT C ON A.PLACE_ID = C.RSTRNT_ID WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.PLACE_ID = #{placeId} AND C.DEL_YN = 'N'
